description:
The stations` next passenger turns out to be not a lost lady, but a lost gentleman. By some accident, businessman Sakuraba finds himself on the Miracle Train. Despite the circumstances, the Miracle Train must stick to its promise, and the stations are forced to solve Sakuraba`s problem. At first he insists nothing is wrong, but before long he reveals a secret he has been keeping from everyone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 男たちのミラクル☆トレイン
